report.title: Notifications list for notifications centre (simplified)
report.description: A list of notifications for use with the notifications centre extension, has additional functionality for handling edit and view icons on the grid when compared to the notifications_list.xml report. Simplified with no join to occurrences for performance - training mode disables responses.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM notifications n LEFT JOIN occurrence_comments oc ON n.source_type='V' AND oc.id=(regexp_matches(n.source_detail, 'oc_id:(\d+)'))[1]::int #joins# WHERE n.acknowledged=false AND n.user_id=#user_id# AND #training#=false AND n.source_type<>'T' -- skip trigger notifications which don't display correctly in the grid #order_by#

param.name: source_filter
param.lookup_values: all:Anything,queries:Queried,rejections:Not accepted,redets:Redeterminations,record_comments:Commented on,verifications:Accepted,record_cleaner:Failed automated checks,pending_groups_users:Requests to join a group you administer

param.name: source_types
param.description: Comma separated list of source types with each item single quoted, or blank to allow all.

param.name: system_name
param.description: Name to display instead of admin for system generated notifications

param.name: default_edit_page_path
param.description: The default page that the notification edit link goes to if the input_form is blank and the user has rights to perform the edit

param.name: view_record_page_path
param.description: The default page that the notification view link goes to if the user has rights to view the record

param.name: groups_admin_page_path
param.description: The path to the page which allows group admins to manage membership

param.name: website_id
param.display: Website Id for the occurrence record.

column.name: manage_members_flag
column.sql: case when n.source_type='GU' then true else false end
